name: Coreopsis
description: Hardy Perennial, Most common color is yellow but it is available in orange, pink, or, red.
author: Eleni

name: Lily of the Valley
description: Spring flower with a lovely smell. Hardy ground cover that will spread over time.
author: Eleni

name: Geranium
description: Lovely houseplant or summer addition. They are not freeze tolerant so they  are considered annuals in colder climates.
author: Eleni

name: Daisy
description: Very hardy Perennial. Easy to grow and very recognizable.
author: Eleni
